department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: central design on pocket has vertical geometric designs with clear bead background; red wool panel above pocket with beaded floral design; each side of strap has different beaded design-blue, green, white and red zigzags on one side, and blue, red, yellow and white geometricized flowers on opposite side; beaded strips with green and red tassels at bottom and at top of strap; red bag backing; printed tan strap backing
title: Bandolier bag
